description:
pip-requires isn't getting processed correctly because a recent change added nova_adminclient when it was already in pip-requires:


Double requirement given: nova-adminclient (from -r tools/pip-requires (line 37)) (aready in nova-adminclient (from -r tools/pip-requires (line 31)), name='nova-adminclient')
title: Double requirement in pip-requires
